about_the_game:
You can't control your speed—only your steering. With this simple yet challenging mechanic, you'll need to master each level you encounter. Navigate through abstract mindscapes inspired by synthwave and the retro-futuristic aesthetics of the 1980s.

Take on 50 hand-crafted levels designed to test your drifting skills and uncover the art of precision and momentum. Once you've conquered the main game, push your limits in Hard Mode, where the true challenge awaits. Feeling unstoppable? Prove your skills in Speedrun Mode and rise to the top of the leaderboards!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 level video card: AMD Radeon 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660. The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Radiant Rush is a sleek and stylish drifting experience where precision steering meets the pulse of synthwave. Glide through mesmerizing, abstract circuits and lose yourself in an electrifying soundtrack that fuels the adrenaline.
